DOC.brief_title: A Dose-Finding Study Comparing InSite Vision , Inc. 101 Vehicle DuraSite Alone Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . Volunteers 18 year age old diagnosis moderate severe dry eye disease . 2 . Negative pregnancy test prior conduct protocolspecific procedure . The subject must use effective contraception duration study . Post menopausal define menses least 12 consecutive month 3 . Signature subject Informed Consent Form 4 . Willing avoid disallow medication duration study . 5 . Able selfadminister study drug ( caregiver available instill dos study drug ) 6 . Able willing follow study instruction 7 . Additional inclusion criterion also apply 1 . Females pregnant nursing . Females childbearing potential ( surgically sterilize postmenopausal ) may participate study agree use adequate birth control method duration study ) . 2 . Use contact lens study . 3 . Use concomitant topical ocular medication except artificial tear dose period 4 . Presence history treatment systemic immunosuppressive chemotherapeutic agent . 5 . Prior anticipate concurrent use investigational product device could confound finding Dry Eye study eye . 6 . A condition situation , investigator 's opinion may put subject increase risk , confound study data , interfere significantly subject 's study participation 7 . Known hypersensitivity component study drug procedural medication 8 . Participation clinical trial within 30 day prior screen 9 . Known hypersensitivity NSAIDS 10 . Any active corneal epithelial/stromal pathology note study eye screen visit 11 . Any history corneal surgery ( include corneal crosslinking , radial keratotomy , corneal transplant , LASIK ) 12 . Cataract surgery within past year . 13 . Known contraindication study drug component
